name: QTP Training
description:
> *After the events in the Mystic Forge, Qadim has returned home to the Hidden City of Ahdashim to usurp a great power. Seek the Key and the cardinals for guidance into the hallowed city walls and stop Qadim from destroying not only the djinn, but also the natural balance of the world.*

This is a run specifically for the last boss of The Key of Ahdashim (Wing 7), <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless**, which is a fairly difficult, complicated boss.

Both power and condi DPS work for this encounter!

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- One healer will need to **Tank**. <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless** hits like a truck, so I recommend you to take a good amount toughness via gear such as `Minstrel's` or `Giver's`.
- The other healer will be expected to do the `Anomalies` mechanic, which requires a bit of ranged hard/soft CC.

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Roles:**
- Three DPS will be expected to do the `Pylon Kiting` mechanic.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This template for a <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless** run has **Tank** / **Anomalies** special roles for the healers to pick up and three **Pylon** special roles for the <:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS** players.
